select OD_THI_ITEM.OD_THI_ITEM_ID , OD_THI_ITEM.MS_ITEM_SBT_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT.ITEM_SBT_NAME as MS_ITEM_SBT_NAME, OD_THI_ITEM.HEADER , OD_THI_ITEM.ITEM_NAME , OD_THI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_THI_ITEM.OD_THI_ID , OD_THI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_THI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_THI_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_THI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_THI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_THI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_THI_ITEM.TS , OD_THI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_THI_ITEM.SHOW_ORDER ,OD_THI_ITEM.OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID
from (OD_THI_ITEM left join MS_ITEM_SBT on OD_THI_ITEM.MS_ITEM_SBT_ID = MS_ITEM_SBT.MS_ITEM_SBT_ID) left join OD_THI on OD_THI_ITEM.OD_THI_ID = OD_THI.OD_THI_ID
WHERE OD_THI_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO OD_THI_ITEM( OD_THI_ITEM_ID, MS_ITEM_SBT_ID, HEADER , ITEM_NAME, BIKOU, OD_THI_ID, SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS , CANCEL_FLAG , SHOW_ORDER ,OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID ) VALUES ( :OD_THI_ITEM_ID, :MS_ITEM_SBT_ID, :HEADER , :ITEM_NAME, :BIKOU, :OD_THI_ID, :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS , :CANCEL_FLAG , :SHOW_ORDER ,:OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID )

UPDATE OD_THI_ITEM SET MS_ITEM_SBT_ID = :MS_ITEM_SBT_ID, HEADER = :HEADER , ITEM_NAME = :ITEM_NAME, BIKOU = :BIKOU, OD_THI_ID = :OD_THI_ID, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS , CANCEL_FLAG = :CANCEL_FLAG , SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER ,OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID = :OD_ATTACH_FILE_ID
WHERE OD_THI_ITEM_ID = :OD_THI_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
DELETE FROM OD_THI_ITEM WHERE OD_THI_ITEM_ID = :OD_THI_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
UPDATE OD_THI_ITEM SET CANCEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE OD_THI_ID = :OD_THI_ID
